description: Oksana, still troubled by her late-night talk with the bartender, runs last modeling projections and drafts a recommendation against immediate enforcement, warning that heavy repression will shatter fragile hope for social recovery.
Her urgent advisory is circulated to Council, arguing for a trust-based suspension and forecast of peaceful self-organization if communities are given air to breathe.
Council, swayed by the analysis, suspends the BCI citywide, with all scores frozen and official checkpoints deactivated to begin a 'social trust trial.'
